changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User3
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE reg_doc_just_plati_atasamente ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, reg_doc_just_plati_id BIGINT NOT NULL, file_name TEXT NOT NULL, file_content BYTEA NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT reg_doc_just_plati_atasamente_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT reg_doc_just_plati_atasamente_reg_doc_just_plati_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (reg_doc_just_plati_id) REFERENCES registru_documente_just_plati(id) );
